doc.title: Dreaming in Morocco
doc.plot: I interviewed Moroccans aged 18-30 from different parts of the country about their daily lives, dreams and views of Americans, and found surprises and contradictions and a lot of inspiring people. This film is intended to break some of the stereotypes Westerners have of Arab and Muslim youth by profiling the dreams of 9 young Moroccans as they navigate life in Morocco today, from the soccer derbies of Casablanca to cybercaf√©s in the old medinas.
